Light Domain Tips & Builds

Light Domain is suited if you're going for a caster Cleric. This domain has access to potent spellcasting which allows you to add its wisdom modifier to damage cantrips making it more reliable. This domain emphasizes on damage and combat with their Burning Hands and Fireball. Warding Flare makes it harder for enemies to hit you.
